ygData.subject: RE: RE: spells?
ygData.msgSnippet: I totally agree with you on the necros, although I ve never played one. I ve ben with a couple, and people can make them work, but people can make ANY class
ygData.messageBody:
I totally agree with you on the necros, although I've never played one. I've
ben with a couple, and people can make them work, but people can make ANY
class work. I heard necros are pretty darn powerful at certain things. And,
most every class has a good niche. I, personally, don't think I'll ever play
one. I HATE being KOS. Screw that...



-----Original Message-----
From: Doug Meade [mailto:dmeade@...]
Sent: Tuesday, July 27, 1999 10:00 AM
To: FlingKirby@...; EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: RE: [EQCheats] spells?


From: "Doug Meade" <dmeade@...>

You really need to get off it. They have been fixing all the probs
with the Necro's.

Let's see. DOT bug. corpse dissappears .. no loot no exp nothing

Pets - ? are you kidding ... Cant use in Duels unless your are +PVP.
And pets are exceedingly dangerous in dungeons as they will either
self-destruct at any time, or randomly smack any npc they go by.
Imagine EVERY npc in a dungeon coming after you then your tank (pet)
self destructing ! ! ! Happened to me in PAW !
And another stupid thing about pets. Even if you get a decent one if
some dumbass gives a good pet a pathetic weapon like a Splintered Club
- he becomes useless. And you have to recast and recast till you get
a decent pet. Summon a green pet and watch how long he lasts. I
believe I have actually heard the OTHER critters Laughing ...

And No, Necros by themselves are not the masters of Kiting. Not
unless they have someone else cast the SOW on them. Cause The
Darkness line sure isnt enough. We have fewer spells. And are only
really really powerfull when it comes to undead. That's IF you can:
1. Find the right Words
2 MAKE THE SPELLS.

Cant just go out and buy them. No pet spells past 20 or 24 ... all
are Research. I know a lvl 45 nec that only has 40% of his higher
lvl spells because He cant find the components to make his spells.


Hated by some NPC's. Try hated by NPC's in ALL cities. Randomly
killed. MOST vendors will not deal with you.

Oh and did you also forget that NECROMANCERS have the LOWEST hit
points in the game. DUH.. didn't know that one huh?

What did I miss? Oh the ROOT Spell ? You're joking right. Necro's
get Root at lvl 34. And I have been told that root at that lvl is
totally pathetic.

Shock of poison? It's at lvl 24. Does 145 . At that lvl that is
not a lot.

And your assumptions as to what the damage of our spell are is wayyy
off. Even it the 3 DOT of death is not resisted (which is not common
even on greens and blues) they do NOT do 400 in a minute. Not in 2
MINUTES. Those DOT's take a LONG time to do all their damage. And
when all 3 do hit the critters compleltly forget about your pet. And
come after you. Pets taunting is pathetic.

And Lets talk Armor and Weapons. Oh wait. Necro not only dont get
decent armor. Are exclued from of MOST of the really nice magic
buffing Items. Did you notice that STAFF OF THE ORACLE on the Dark
Side page. Look closely... Necro's cant even use it. Dagger of
Marnek ? Only Necro only item I have seen.
Dmg 3 attack 30..... At least till you can get a Writhing Staff...
lets see they are running 500 plat on the rathe.... yea.. easy
there.. NOT.

You think necro's have it so easy ... try to play one. Watch how
much being hated increases prices.... being KOS's everywhere slows
you down... When you have played one up to 16 or so .... then lets
see how much you would think they are overpowered... till then...

GET OVER IT ! ! !

Thanos, HUMAN Necromancer the Rathe


>>> "Fling, Kirby" <FlingKirby@...> 07/23 1:42 PM >>>
From: "Fling, Kirby" <FlingKirby@...>

Now, with all that said... does anybody else think that necros are
vastly
overpowered? They do FAR more damage than any other class at all
levels,
they get pretty much every combat-utility spell that any other class
gets
(like roots, disempowers, debuffs, etc), AND get the ability to
summon pets
of higher level than any other class.

Not to be a huge bitch or anything. I was fine with that at first,
but
since EVERY recent patch has included further buffing or tuning of
the necro
class it just seems to be getting a little absurd to me.

Somebody tell me what the drawback is for their class... being hated
by
some NPCs? After having played a troll for several months and being
KOS by
EVERY npc north of innothule.... the necros have it easy... like
super-easy.
Then they went and gimped the shamans and I just honestly can't
figure out
what is going on. I'm guessing I'm not seeing the whole picture or
something.... because recent events just haven't made any sense to
this
stupid troll.

-K




-----Original Message-----
Heart Flutter also drops a monsters AC by 47 and his str by 17, hit
it with
the 1st lvl spell Siphon Str and that gives 10 more Str to you. So
with
the 3 It is Slowed, Weakened, Has its Ac dropped a good bit you are
doing
about 400 points of damage in a min (The Dark Side has a nice listing
of the
spells and what they do per tick).
